books.title: The Book of Jade
books.author: David Park Barnitz
books.summary: A collection of decadent poetry by David Park Barnitz.

books.title: The Mucker
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: A street tough undergoes a transformation as he navigates the dangerous worlds of Chicago’s slums, a South Pacific island, and the wilds of Mexico.

books.title: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
books.author: Mahatma Gandhi
books.summary: Gandhi relates his life experiences from his birth in Gujarat in 1869 through the Indian National Congress of 1915.

books.title: The Lives and Opinions of Eminent Philosophers
books.author: Diogenes Laërtius
books.summary: Brief biographies of the prominent philosophers of ancient Greece.

books.title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
books.author: Carlo Collodi
books.summary: A wooden puppet comes to life and goes on adventures.

books.title: Sunshine Sketches of a Little Town
books.author: Stephen Leacock
books.summary: A humorous account of life in the fictional small town of Mariposa.

books.title: Troilus and Cressida
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A Trojan prince falls in love with a woman amid the Trojan War, only to see her exchanged to the Greeks for a prisoner of war.

books.title: Harding’s Luck
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: A poor orphan boy accidentally discovers magic which sends him into the past and leads to his recovery of a fortune and a lordly title.

books.title: The Old Curiosity Shop
books.author: Charles Dickens
books.summary: A girl and her grandfather struggle through a life of poverty amidst a diverse cast of memorable characters in Victorian London.

books.title: The Magician
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A young engaged couple meet a mysterious man who claims to have practical knowledge of the occult.

books.title: The Bolshevik Myth
books.author: Alexander Berkman
books.summary: A left-wing radical records his experiences in revolutionary Russia.

books.title: The Secret of Chimneys
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: A murder at a country house embroils its weekend guests in an international regicide, while a famous jewel thief may be lurking among them.

books.title: Practical Mysticism
books.author: Evelyn Underhill
books.summary: Evelyn Underhill makes the case that mysticism is accessible and beneficial to everyone.

books.title: Democracy and Social Ethics
books.author: Jane Addams
books.summary: Jane Addams argues that addressing social issues like poverty and inequality requires shifting from individual morality to a collective understanding of social responsibility.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Ameen Rihani
books.summary: A collection of Ameen Rihani’s poetry.

books.title: Democracy
books.author: Henry Adams
books.summary: A wealthy New York widow moves to Washington, DC, hoping to get “to the heart of the great American mystery of democracy and government.”

books.title: A Strange Manuscript Found in a Copper Cylinder
books.author: James De Mille
books.summary: A shipwrecked sailor travels through a portal to a lost world populated by fantastic creatures and a strange civilization.

books.title: The Confessions of Arsène Lupin
books.author: Maurice Leblanc
books.summary: The gentleman-thief relates stories of his outwitting the Parisian detectives.

books.title: Religion and the Rise of Capitalism
books.author: R. H. Tawney
books.summary: A tracing of the development of religious thought from the Middle Ages to the dawn of the Industrial Revolution.

books.title: South!
books.author: Ernest Shackleton
books.summary: A British expedition sets off to cross Antarctica, but when their ship is wrecked they have to face a long struggle for survival.
